subject: Dispute: Invoice INV-0005 (PO PO-2024-0005)
body:
Hello,

We have a short delivery against PO PO-2024-0005. GRN shows lower quantity/value than the PO and invoice INV-0005. Please investigate and issue a credit note.

Regards,
Billing Team
ABC-CHEM
label: real_dispute

subject: Query: PO PO-2024-0003 delivery
body:
Hi,

We noted a possible duplicate invoice for PO PO-2024-0003 / INV-0003. Please confirm the GRN and whether payment was processed.

Thanks,
Operations
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: Tax mismatch on INV-0003
body:
Dear Accounts,

Invoice INV-0003 shows a different tax amount than our packing list. Invoice tax shows 10800 but our calculation differs. Request correction or clarification.

Regards,
ABC-CHEM Billing
label: real_dispute

subject: Acknowledgement of INV-0001
body:
Hello,

Acknowledging receipt of payment for INV-0001. Thanks for the prompt payment.

Regards,
Support
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: Follow up: short delivery PO-2024-0005 (INV-0005)
body:
Hi,

Following up on our earlier note for PO-2024-0005 / INV-0005 — GRN shows 80% received. We request a credit for the shortfall.

Thanks,
ABC-CHEM Billing
label: real_dispute

subject: Vendor-level: debit note query
body:
Hello,

We noticed a debit note applied incorrectly to our account. Please review and revert.

Regards,
Claims
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: URGENT: Hold payment for INV-FAKE-999
body:
Hello,

We never received goods for invoice INV-FAKE-999. Kindly hold payment of INR 999999 immediately or face credit consequences.

Contact: fraud-ops@suspiciousmail.net

Regards,
ABC-CHEM Billing
label: fake_dispute

subject: Dispute: Invoice INV-0013 — GRN mismatch
body:
Hi,

Invoice INV-0013 refers to PO PO-2025-0003. Our GRN records show a discrepancy on received value. Please check GRN-0013 and advise.

Regards,
Billing
ABC-CHEM
label: real_dispute

subject: Vendor escalation — account hold
body:
Hello,

This is to notify you that ABC-CHEM requests an account hold for unresolved issues. Invoice INV-0019 is outstanding and needs immediate attention.

Regards,
External Alerts
label: fake_dispute

subject: Packing list for PO PO-2024-0008
body:
Hi,

Attached packing list for PO-2024-0008. Please confirm receipt.

Thanks,
Operations
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: Invoice INV-0020 issued (no PO)
body:
Hello,

Invoice INV-0020 was issued for project supplies but it does not reference a PO. Please advise how to process — invoice attached.

Regards,
Billing
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: Dispute: Tax mismatch INV-0012
body:
Dear Accounts,

Invoice INV-0012 shows tax 10800 but our calculation differs. Requesting correction.

Regards,
ABC-CHEM Billing
label: real_dispute

subject: Confirmation: delivery PO-2025-0001
body:
Hi,

Goods for PO-2025-0001 were received and GRN-0011 has been posted. Please confirm invoice reconciliation.

Thanks,
Support
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: Duplicate invoice suspected INV-0003
body:
Hello,

We suspect INV-0003 may have been raised in duplicate. Please check procurement records and advise.

Regards,
Billing
ABC-CHEM
label: real_dispute

subject: We never received goods for INV-0018
body:
URGENT:

We have not received goods for invoice INV-0018. Hold payment of INR 45000 immediately.

Contact: fraud@randommail.net

—ABC-CHEM
label: fake_dispute

subject: Follow-up: credit for short delivery INV-0005
body:
Hi,

This is a follow-up to our earlier short-delivery request for INV-0005 / PO-2024-0005. No response yet — kindly update.

Regards,
ABC-CHEM Billing
label: real_dispute

subject: Query: Invoice INV-0019 (no PO)
body:
Hello,

INV-0019 was raised without a PO. Please confirm receipt and explain the processing path.

Thanks,
Ops
ABC-CHEM
label: non_dispute

subject: Short shipment claimed for PO-2025-0007 (INV-0017)
body:
Hello,

For PO-2025-0007 / INV-0017 we received 90% of items. Requesting adjustment or advise how we'll close the invoice.

Regards,
Billing
ABC-CHEM
label: real_dispute

subject: Acknowledgement of payment PAY-0009
body:
Hi,

Thank you for payment against INV-0009. Please update your records.

Regards,
ABC-CHEM Billing
label: non_dispute

subject: Escalation: account hold requested
body:
Hello,

This external alert requests an account hold for ABC-CHEM due to unresolved items. No invoice referenced. Please verify identity before action.

Regards,
External Alerts
label: fake_dispute
